ygData.msgSnippet: You may have kept the people from going off Cybertron code, which would be unrealistic for Cybertrons. If we could expand the RPG past one singular world then

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

         You may have kept the people from going off Cybertron code, which 
would be unrealistic for Cybertrons. If we could expand the RPG past one 
singular world then that would create excitement and people would post more 
often as there would be more to do. Storys could bloom and develop as 
charachter can interact with new things. Rather then everyone just fighting 
each other all the time and being fenced in.

--part1_14c.467652b.292d6b8b_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

<HTML><FONT FACE=arial,helvetica><FONT  SIZE=2 FAMILY="SERIF" FACE="Times New Roman" LANG="0">         You may have kept the people from going off Cybertron code, which would be unrealistic for Cybertrons. If we could expand the RPG past one singular world then that would create excitement and people would post more often as there would be more to do. Storys could bloom and develop as charachter can interact with new things. Rather then everyone just fighting each other all the time and being fenced in.</FONT></HTML>

--part1_14c.467652b.292d6b8b_boundary--
